name: Boyancheng.GitHub.io
body:
### welcome
This is a collection of some of my technical work related to quantitative finance. Homework sets, papers I've authored,  Python programs, and blog posts are all fair game.

### my python notebooks
* [python basics](https://github.com/boyancheng/qfrm-python/blob/master/python-basics-notebook.ipynb)

### Python in Finance
We use Python in some of our classes, and here is some of my work:
* [Basics notebook](https://github.com/pbenson/qfrm-bootcamp/blob/gh-pages/python-templates/python-basics-notebook-empty.ipynb)
* [Secret notebook](https://github.com/pbenson/qfrm-bootcamp/blob/gh-pages/python-templates/python-secret-notebook-empty.ipynb)

### Papers
* need to be updated

### About me
I am a grad student at the University of Michigan, in the [Quantitative Finance and Risk Management](https://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program. I am a double Bachelor's degree student in Wuhan University of China, and my major is Financial Engineering, minor is Mathematics & Applied Mathematics. My interest area is Financial Derivatives and Stochastic Analysis. I like listening to pop songs and playing table tennis and badminton in my spare time.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
